content.rendered:

Multipoint know-how and excessive compatibility: pair two phones and reply calls from one, multipoint know-how permits simultaneous connection with 2 Bluetooth gadgets. Superior consolation: weighs solely 0.48 ounces. It is light-weight and comfy sufficient to be worn for hours. The versatile microphone and rotating ear hook slot in any ear. Ultimate consolation ear gels can be found in 3 completely different sizes to make sure a tailor-made match.
